days_of_month.description: DayOfMonth defines list of numerical days in the month. Days begin at 1. Negative values are also accepted. for example, ['1:5', '-3:-1']

location.description: Location in golang time location form, e.g. UTC

months.description: Months  defines list of calendar months identified by a case-insensitive name (e.g. ‘January’) or numeric 1. For example, ['1:3', 'may:august', 'december']

times.description: Times defines time range for mute

weekdays.description: Weekdays defines list of days of the week, where the week begins on Sunday and ends on Saturday.

years.description: Years defines numerical list of years, ranges are accepted. For example, ['2020:2022', '2030']
